```js

let num2 = 20.234; //floating point number
console.log(num1 + num2); //outputs 30.234
```

```js

}
```

```js
let age = 20
let isAdult = age > 18 ? true : false; //age is greater than 18, so true is returned
console.log(isAdult) 
//outputs
true 
```
